nodes.text: Shura was a Human female who served in the Mantellian Army of the Galactic Republic as an Ordnance officer during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the war she was stationed on the planet Ord Mantell, where the Ord Mantell Central Authority was at war with a Mantellian Separatist Movement. There, she operated a stall in Oradam village from which she sold various weapons. While at her stall she wore blue armor including a helmet, and white leggings. Shura had fair skin and brown eyes.

Shura first appeared in the 2011 MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare. In the game she acts as a Republic weapons vendor on Ord Mantell. Her location is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
